# heightDimension

**Instance Property**

The height dimension of an item in a collection view layout.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var heightDimension: NSCollectionLayoutDimension { get }
```

## Getting the width and height

- **widthDimension**: The width dimension of an item in a collection view layout.
